Resources

Source: vignettes/h-resources.Rmd
h-resources.Rmd

The golem package is part of the {golemverse}, a series of tools for Shiny. A list of various golem related resources (tutorials, video, blog post,…) can be found here.

Examples apps

You can find apps made by ThinkR using golem here:

  • https://connect.thinkr.fr/connect/
  • https://github.com/ColinFay/golemexamples

These are examples from the community. Please note that they may not necessarily be written in a canonical fashion and may have been written with different versions of golem or Shiny.

  • https://github.com/seanhardison1/vcrshiny
  • https://github.com/Nottingham-and-Nottinghamshire-ICS/healthcareSPC
  • https://github.com/marton-balazs-kovacs/tenzing
  • https://github.com/shahreyar-abeer/cranstars

Do you have a golem app you’d like to share? Please open a PR to add it to this list!

Book

Read the book Engineering Production-Grade Shiny Apps.

Cheatsheet

The high-resolution golem cheatsheet is available to download here: https://thinkr.fr/golem_cheatsheet_V0.1.pdf
